Bash(Uses Closure." because home route used a closure instead of a controller.

Fixes:
- Created WelcomeController for the public home page
- Replaced closure route with controller action: WelcomeController@index
- Installer now handles route caching errors gracefully (skips if closures exist)
- All routes now use controller actions, enabling route caching in production

This enables full Laravel optimization (config cache, route cache, view cache)
for better performance on embedded devices.
